short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calls from your browser. Popular CRM integrations
short.ru: Звонки из браузера. Интеграции с популярными CRM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calls from the browser. Saves calls to the popular CRM.
Calls from the browser through the service IPMAXI.

Advanced version of communicator with new features.

Key features:

1. Calls to any numbers
2. Interception of links callto :, tel:
3. Call transfer
4. List of recent calls
5. Contact list
6. Call Feedback
7. Change the device used
8. Contact information from CRM
9. Transition to contact / deal in CRM
10. Hotkeys (answer / reset / hold)
11. Call Hold
12. Microphone on / off
13. Call saved to CRM according to opened page (need to turn on in settings)

An access to the active tab is needed to handle callto: links and to show the call feedback popup in a convenient way.
Single purpose: online phone.
